name: jwt-auth-flow

scripts.start: concurrently "npm run start:backend" "npm run dev:web-react" "npm start:mobile-expo"
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:web-react" "npm run dev:mobile-expo"
scripts.install:all: npm run install:backend && npm run install:web-react && npm run install:mobile-expo
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules && cd backend && rm -rf node_modules && cd ../web-react && rm -rf node_modules && cd ../mobile-expo && rm -rf node_modules

description: JWT Authentication Flow with Backend, Web and Mobile App
